content: Edit the following sentence about the invention of the telescope to make it more concise and accurate: "The telescope, a magnificent device that has allowed humans to explore the vast cosmos, was invented by Galileo Galilei in 1608, although some sources suggest that it might have been created earlier by other inventors."
The telescope, enabling cosmic exploration, was invented by Galileo Galilei in 1608, though some attribute its creation to earlier inventors.
